Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections (4–5 µm) mounted on positively charged slides
Purpose: Immunohistochemical detection of Semaphorin 3B in tissue sections to ensure consistent, accurate, and reproducible staining results
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, incubator/oven, Coplin jars or staining dishes, microwave or pressure cooker for antigen retrieval, humidity chamber, light microscope
